Eric Schmidt said that managing Google has become a more complex job as the company has diversified. Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, he said. NFC starting quarterback Michael Vick of Philadelphia probably appreciates his appearance more than anyone on either side of the ball, considering how far he has come since serving prison time for his role in dogfighting operation. This one feels great due to the fact that I've been through so much and trained to getting back to this position, he said earlier this week. ''It's paramount for me and my family and I'm just thankful.''

Report Abuse I sincerely hope the Egyptian people eventually will win their freedom. However, the Cairo museum is one of the world's greatest museums. It's artifacts are beyond price. They are the cultural heritage of the Egyptian people representing one of the world's earliest and greatest civilizations. It would be a tragedy for Egypt and it's people if the Cairo Museum were looted and trashed like the Bagdad Museum. Report Abuse ''Headline: ''Egypt's museums and monuments are deserted'''

with Unequal Technologies, a provider of the football pads Michael Vick wore most of this season. ''To sum it all up, the last five months, have been delayed gratification,'' Michael Vick said. Things that I wanted to accomplish the last couple years that I couldn't and I had to wait for it, and I had to be patient, and I did it and it all paid off. I just thank God for putting me with the right group of people, with Andy, with a flagship organization, a great group of coaches.... They give me all the credit, but I give them the credit.
